description:
Maeda goes to public bath along with Chie-chan and Reiko. 
The bath is filled with old men even though it just opened. It seems they are there for Chie-chan. 
They are able to hear Chie-chan and Reiko’s conversation next door if they listen carefully...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma proprio va aux bains publics
The Landlord Goes to the Public Baths!
